original_text: Now it came to pass in the days when the judges ruled, that there was a famine in the land. And a certain man of Bethlehemjudah went to sojourn in the country of Moab, he, and his wife, and his two sons.
korean_text: 사사들이 치리하던 때에 그 땅에 흉년이 드니라 유다 베들레헴에 한 사람이 그의 아내와 두 아들을 데리고 모압 지방에 가서 거류하였는데

sentences.original_text: Now it came to pass in the days when the judges ruled
that there was a famine in the land
And a certain man of Bethlehemjudah
went to sojourn in the country of Moab
sentences.korean_translation: 모압 땅에서 머물러 살기 위해 갔다

sentences.original_text: he, and his wife, and his two sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 아내와 그의 두 아들이
